segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 10
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 10

segments.pli: 21. Karajakāyavagga
segments.en: 21. The Body Born of Deeds

segments.pli: 220. Adhammacariyāsutta
segments.en: 220. Unprincipled Conduct

segments.pli: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
segments.en: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha and exchanged greetings with him.

segments.pli: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side and said to the Buddha:

segments.pli: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti?
segments.en: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell?”

segments.pli: “Adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
segments.en: “Unprincipled and immoral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”

segments.pli: “Ko pana, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti?
segments.en: “But what is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm?”

segments.pli: “Dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
segments.en: “Principled and moral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”

segments.pli: “Na kho ahaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
segments.en: “I don’t understand the detailed meaning of what Master Gotama has said in brief.

segments.pli: Sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu yathāhaṃ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājāneyyan”ti.
segments.en: Please, Master Gotama, teach me this matter so I can understand the detailed meaning.”

segments.pli: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
segments.en: “Well then, brahmin, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”

segments.pli: “Evaṃ, bho”ti kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
segments.en: “Yes, sir,” the brahmin replied.

segments.pli: Bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: The Buddha said this:

segments.pli: “Tividhā kho, brāhmaṇa, kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti;
segments.en: “Brahmin, unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of body,

segments.pli: catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti;
segments.en: fourfold by way of speech,

segments.pli: tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: and threefold by way of mind.

segments.pli: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And how is unprincipled and immoral conduct threefold by way of body? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena adhammacariyā visamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of body.

segments.pli: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And how is unprincipled and immoral conduct fourfold by way of speech? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is fourfold by way of speech.

segments.pli: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And how is unprincipled and immoral conduct threefold by way of mind? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā adhammacariyāvisamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is threefold by way of mind.

segments.pli: Evaṃ adhammacariyāvisamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti.
segments.en: That’s how unprincipled and immoral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.

segments.pli: Tividhā, brāhmaṇa, kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti;
segments.en: Principled and moral conduct is threefold by way of body,

segments.pli: catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti;
segments.en: fourfold by way of speech,

segments.pli: tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: and threefold by way of mind.

segments.pli: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And how is principled and moral conduct threefold by way of body? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: That’s how principled and moral conduct is threefold by way of body.

segments.pli: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And how is principled and moral conduct fourfold by way of speech? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, catubbidhā vācāya dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: That’s how principled and moral conduct is fourfold by way of speech.

segments.pli: Kathañca, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti … pe …
segments.en: And how is principled and moral conduct threefold by way of mind? …

segments.pli: evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, tividhā manasā dhammacariyāsamacariyā hoti.
segments.en: That’s how principled and moral conduct is threefold by way of mind.

segments.pli: Evaṃ dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, brāhmaṇa, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti.
segments.en: That’s how principled and moral conduct is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.”

segments.pli: “Abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
segments.en: “Excellent, Master Gotama! Excellent! …

segments.pli: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
segments.en: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Karajakāyavaggo paṭhamo.

sections.title: Then a certain brahmin went up to the Buddha…

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha teaches a brahmin that bad conduct leads to hell, good conduct to heaven.
